Core Features

  • TECHNO-HUMAN INTELLIGENCE

    Revolutionising the hiring workflow- integrating technology and human intelligence seamlessly

  • INTERACTIVE INTERVIEW SCHEDULING

    Valuing talent and their time is the core of any great hiring strategy

  • STANDARDISED RESUME FORMAT

    The future belongs to unbiased hiring- strength to look beyond the blind spots

  • REAL TIME STATUS ALERTS

    Real time alerts and notifications to support faster response time and quicker decisions

  • DYNAMIC DATA MASKING

    Need based data unmasking to protect the privacy of all our stakeholders

  • STAKEHOLDER RATING

    Point based rating of stakeholders- we believe in connecting real people to real jobs

A technologically advanced, new and revolutionary referral driven recruiting platform that brings employers, referrers to match top quality talent with great positions, and make the experience extremely rewarding for everyone involved.

AntLegs realizes a future where recruiters can seamlessly work with employers to fill open / vacant positions faster improving quality of hire and significantly reduce cost per hire.

Why Antlegs?

  • Employers
  • Recruiters

  • Post Job

    Post a job and set the referral reward

  • View Response

    View quality resumes sourced by recruiters

  • Hire

    Track the progress of each job posted through Antlegs dashboard

  • Pay

    After a successful hire, the employer release the reward to Antlegs

  • Post Job

    Post a job and set the referral reward

  • View Response

    View quality resumes sourced by recruiters

  • Hire

    Track the progress of each job posted through Antlegs dashboard

  • Pay

    After a successful hire, the employer release the reward to Antlegs
